newsitem.title: URUGUAY: SOCCER-NACIONAL WIN FIRST STAGE OF URUGUAYAN CHAMPIONSHIP.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-NACIONAL WIN FIRST STAGE OF URUGUAYAN CHAMPIONSHIP.

text.p: Nacional won the Apertura tournament, the first stage of the Uruguayan soccer championship, with a game to spare on Thursday as they beat Liverpool 3-0.
The win put them four points ahead of arch-rivals Penarol with one round of fixtures left on Sunday.
Nacional will meet the winners of the Clausura tournament, held in the second half of the year, to decide the season's overall champion.
